website_summaries.verdict: This lap loom is a good way to learn how to begin weaving.
pros: Easy to store when you are not weaving
A good loom for kids with patience who want to do a more advanced project
Also, a relaxing loom for adult use
cons: There is no way to advance the warp on this loom, limiting the size of your projects

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful loom!
customer_reviews.text: Love this loom. It is exactly what I wanted. Very sturdy build and well made. Came with everything listed in description.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Bear Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Warped Weaver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a tool for my daughter in law to learn how to do tapestry weaving. The size and structure are perfect for learning the different techniques; its portability is excellent. Overall, it works beautifully for my objectives. It will function quite nicely for anyone wanting to learn standard weaving techniques on a budget. It also would be a good product for making handwoven placemats and other items for use in the home.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beginner loom
customer_reviews.text: Excellent beginner loom! It's a great size for making projects--you can easily make a pillow or a small wall hanging. The whole loom is very sturdy. I didn't care much for the string that came with the loom, but it's easy to buy your own. You may want to invest in a little easel to hold this up on a table while you are weaving--it can hurt your back to lean over while working. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: J Williams

customer_reviews.title: First non-cardboard loom
customer_reviews.text: Love my loom. Hardly ever use the shuttles and shed sticks so just need to Better figure out how to use those. It was such a tiny bit of yarn that came with it, I've just been using my own stash. The instructions/pattern that came with it seemed a bit intimidating. It would take A highly concentrated (and motivated) child to do much more than warp it. Thankfully, there are lots of great YouTube and blog videos out there so I have been free styling it and loving it. Mostly, I was using (and still use) a cardboard loom. Maybe when I get to more complicated weaving a I will see a bigger difference.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: High quality loom
customer_reviews.text: Product exactly as advertised. A large hardwood lap loom with a modest amount of weaving yarn to do a all project. It works exactly as it should and is sturdy. My 11-year old daughter did a weaving project in school and wanted a larger loom for herself, and she loves it. We have not had any problems. Her friends from another school did a similar project and upon seeing this, asked their mother for one as well. This was about $13 cheaper than at Hearthsong.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great beginning product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old son for a project for his homeschool art class. It is wonderful and easy for him to use. It comes with one project of supplies and easy to read instructions. He watches a movie and works on it. I am glad Amazon had this Lap Loom and at such a good price. I even got free shipping on it as it was Amazon Prime. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Youngasylum

customer_reviews.title: yarn is garbage. I like that they chose all natural wool
customer_reviews.text: Descent loom, yarn is garbage. I like that they chose all natural wool, but it falls apart like paper
customer_reviews.author: frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: For beginning crafters
customer_reviews.text: It is a sturdy wooden frame with pegs. I bought it for lap weaving, and it was a bit too large for that. I normally weave on a regular loom, so it did not keep my interest.
customer_reviews.author: tinaja

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews,also needed you tube to help get started.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Color of yarns do not match descriptions of yarns in instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: High quality and very easy to learn. My six-year old daughter and I worked together on our first piece. It's a great project for relaxing and also remembering art lessons on design! This is a picture of our first wall hanging. I really liked the colors they included with the kit, and added some of my own yarn from deconstructed chunky scarves and sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelineb

customer_reviews.title: Laploom
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a hard project for an 8 year old. It was hard for gramma and grampa to figure out so we could instruct the 8 year old. It isn't for those who want instant gratification as it will take a long time to complete a project with such thin yarn. Not sure if bigger yarn would stay around the pegs but that would be my next thing to try.
customer_reviews.author: Millie R.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: I wanted someting small (for small projects like dish cloths, wash cloths that I give as gifts) that wouldn't require the warp work of my rigid heddle. This does a good job for doing what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: The loom is 1st class and looks like it will last for a long time. The stick shuttles also seem to be thick and sturdy. I would have given the whole package 5 stars, but the shed sticks are way to flimsy - wish they made with a better quality and thicker wood.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Fun!! Seems sturdy and versatile. I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KarenS

customer_reviews.title: not clearly described
customer_reviews.text: it was not clearly described that you have to remove one heddle then reinsert it onto the warp. my granddaughter has difficulty in doing this step.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy transaction. Item as expected. Will be learning with my granddaughter for whom I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Fashinpaur

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I am really new in this craft, but I’m loving this loom! It is very sturdy, great craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: Well made loom. Easy to learn. Just wished they had lacquered the weaving sticks as the yarn tends to catch on the wood.
customer_reviews.author: A. harley

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter love it. As soon as I open the package ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter love it. As soon as I open the package she start putting the loom together and then started on her design.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought a smaller lap loom first but soon realized it wasn't large enough. Upgraded to this, it comes with all you need to begin looming.
customer_reviews.author: SgtJ

customer_reviews.title: Just received my lap loom and love it. I am a beginner and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my lap loom and love it. I am a beginner and it is very easy to use and perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Jpress

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lap loom
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lap loom! The loom is exactly as described on Amazon, a plus in any weaver's book! I would recommend this loom to anyone - beginning or advanced weavers would find it useful!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: really nice quality wood. And everything seems to be built well.
customer_reviews.author: Ardie W

customer_reviews.title: The price was great and seems sturdy and nice to have some yarn ...
customer_reviews.text: I am excited to experiment more with the lap loom!! The price was great and seems sturdy and nice to have some yarn and tools to start with. I wish they had it on the canadian site but I had to ship in the States as it was only available on the .com site.
customer_reviews.author: JQ Artist

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product. It does the job for me. I now have to come up with ten more words
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Buyalos

customer_reviews.title: great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: When I was a teenager a loved weaving by hand on a loom I made myself. I decided to get back into it and this one was perfect for me. Small enough to take with you and big enough for larger projects. Includes everything you need to start weaving right away. The instructions are easy to follow. And there are drawn diagrams to assist with explaining some basic techteches. I'd recomend this to any beginner adult.
customer_reviews.author: MadamSolomon

customer_reviews.title: cheap, broke the second time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: One of the pegs snapped off the second time I was using the loom and stringing the warp on it. Ridiculous, when you consider that this is really just a wooden frame with plastic pegs attached to it, and they couldn't even get that right. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: paldenlhamo

customer_reviews.title: Broken peg
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time using this product. Unfortunately one of the legs snapped. Such a shame and now I am not eligible for a return. It would be a lovely product if it didn't break.
customer_reviews.author: Steph773

customer_reviews.title: Love the Lap Loom!
customer_reviews.text: It may seem a little more expensive than other children's looms, but it's well worth it. You'll find that it's very sturdy and the perfect size for purses, etc. My 9 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: chicmama4

product_meta.title: Harrisville Designs Lap Loom Kit, Hand Weaving for Kids and Adults (Style B)
product_meta.description:
Our lap Looms are portable hardwood tapestry or frame Looms that can be woven on while resting On a table, floor or, Yes, your lap! The lap Looms include: 1 ounce of cotton warp string, 100% pure virgin wool weft yarn (enough to complete 1 Project) 1 tapestry needle, 2 wooden shed sticks, 1- 6" Wooden stick shuttle, illustrated instructions.Harrisville is a small, family owned and operated business, and we believe that quality should not be compromised for even the smallest product.

AMAZON.COM
As kids weave and create textile projects they're proud to keep or give as gifts, they'll be learning math and design skills! How crafty, indeed! With this simple, sturdy, authentic hardwood lap loom, your kids can learn basic techniques for weaving tapestries, wall hangings, bags, pillows, place mats, purses, and more. The larger of the Harrisville Designs two lap models, this Size B loom measures 14.5 by 18.5 inches. Like the Size A loom, it's built with slanted nylon pegs and comes with enough cotton warp string and 100 percent virgin wool yarn to weave one project. Also included are basic weaving tools, including a stick shuttle, a large blunt tapestry needle, and two shed sticks. In addition, a 16-page booklet provides information about the history of weaving, as well as instructions on basic technique. Winner of Learning Magazine's Teachers' Choice Award, this loom is recommended for children ages 7 and older, although preteens will probably need adult help to get started. --Joan DeClaire

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Our Lap Looms are portable hardwood tapestry or frame looms that can be woven on while resting on a table, floor or, yes, your lap! The Lap Looms include: 1 ounce of Cotton Warp String, 100% Pure Virgin Wool Weft Yarn (enough to complete 1 project) 1 Tapestry Needle, 2 Wooden Shed Sticks, 1- 6" Wooden Stick Shuttle, Illustrated Instructions.Harrisville is a small, family owned and operated business, and we believe that quality should not be compromised for even the smallest product.

See more
feature_bullets: Harrisville Lap Loom kit makes beautiful and colorful tapestries.
Versatile tools and instructions allow you to make any custom design.
Hand weaving is a time-honored, educational and fun activity for children and adults alike.
Preserves the New Hampshire tradition of handmade textiles produced exclusively in the USA.
Includes 1 Tapestry Needle, 2 Wooden Shed Sticks, 2 Wooden Stick Shuttles and illustrated instructions. For ages 7 and up.
